Real Madrid : les 5 onze possibles pour Zidane




Les joueurs du FC Barcelone r√©alisent un d√©but de saison tr√®s poussif. Quels¬†sont les √©l√©ments¬†qui parasitent la machine catalane ? Pourquoi ce club peine √† sortir de sa l√©thargie ?




Le cas Griezmann pose question




Antoine Griezmann+6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Le cas Antoine Griezmann est assez symptomatique des probl√®mes actuels du Bar√ßa. Depuis son arriv√©e l'√©t√© dernier, l'attaquant fran√ßais semble avoir du mal √† assimiler les principes de jeu dict√©s par Valverde. Balad√© √† gauche ou √† droite de l'attaque catalane, la star des Bleus n'arrive pas √† cr√©er¬†une connexion technique avec la paire Messi-Suarez. Les statistiques de Griezmann sont pour l'instant insuffisantes : 4 buts en 13 rencontres. Enfin, il n'est pas encore un titulaire incontestable puisqu'il a parfois √©t√© sur le banc des rempla√ßants.¬†
Le manque de professionnalisme d'Ousmane Demb√©l√©




Ousmane Demb√©l√©+6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Ousmane Demb√©l√© est certes un joueur talentueux mais son professionnalisme laisse encore √† d√©sirer. Souvent en retard aux entra√Ænements collectifs, l'attaquant fran√ßais ne fait pas l'unanimit√© dans le vestiaire. Ses performances sur le terrain (quand il n'est pas bless√©) sont irr√©guli√®res. Son manque de rigueur d√©fensive ne plaide pas pour lui. Et Ernesto Valverde ne semble pas enclin √† lui faire de cadeaux. Si la tendance n√©gative persiste, il se pourrait bien que l'ailier quitte la Catalogne la saison prochaine.
La Masia s'essouffle




Ansu Fati, un jeune prometteur issu de la Masia+6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Durant des ann√©es, la Masia, le centre de formation du FC Barcelone, a √©t√© la grande fiert√© des dirigeants Blaugrana. Mais aujourd'hui, la Masia ne sort plus v√©ritablement ds joyaux, √† l'instar des Messi, Xavi et Iniesta. Sur la sc√®ne europ√©enne notamment, cela lui pote pr√©judice. Par ailleurs, certains jeunes joueurs, qui estiment avoir le niveau pour int√©grer l'√©quipe A,¬†manifestent leur incompr√©hension quant au refus de Valverde de les faire jouer. Riqui Puig, par exemple,¬†a ainsi mis en exergue sa lassitude face √† son manque de temps de jeu.¬†
Arturo Vidal est malheureux




Arturo Vidal+6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Le Chilien Arturo Vidal est tr√®s m√©content de sa situation au¬†FC Barcelone. Le valeureux milieu de terrain, confront√© √† une rude concurrence, ne comprend pas pourquoi il n'est pas titulaire. Loin d'√™tre r√©sign√©, Vidal, √¢g√© de 32 ans, souffre peut-√™tre de son profil, trop √©loign√© des standards du Bar√ßa. Pourtant, ses entr√©es font souvent du bien au dispositif mis en place par Valverde.¬†
Le Bar√ßa encaisse trop de buts




Marc-Andr√© ter Stegen+6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

En d√©pit des performances exceptionnelles de son gardien allemand Marc-Andr√© ter Stegen, le FC Barcelone encaisse trop de buts depuis de longs mois. Le bloc d√©fensif n'est pas efficace, au m√™me titre que le pressing exerc√© traditionnellement par les Blaugrana.¬†On a le sentiment, de plus, que quelque chose s'est cass√© lors de la d√©faite face √† Rome en quart de finale retour de la Ligue des Champions (d√©faite 3-0 au Stadio Olimpico). Cette √©quipe a subi une autre remontada √† Anfield l'an dernier (4-0 face √† Liverpool). Le Bar√ßa est donc en perte de vitesse, voire de confiance.¬†

text:
Liga
Bar√ßa: the burning files of Valverde
FC Barcelona is going through a little crisis. Co-leader of La Liga with Real Madrid and Real Sociedad, the Blaugrana have already lost 11 points in La Liga.
05 Nov 2019, 19:41 by Mourad Bennis



Real Madrid: the 5 possible eleven for ZidaneTo compose his team, the coach will have a wide choice. Discover 5 possibilities for him!




Demivol√©e





Demivol√©e





Demivol√©e





Demivol√©e





Demivol√©e


Real Madrid: the 5 eleven possible for Zidane




FC Barcelona players have a very early start to the season. What are the elements that parasitize the Catalan machine? Why is this club struggling to break out of its lethargy?




The Griezmann case raises questions




Antoine Griezmann + 6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The case of Antoine Griezmann is rather symptomatic of the current problems of Bar√ßa. Since his arrival last summer, the French striker seems to have trouble assimilating the principles of play dictated by Valverde. Balad√© left or right of the Catalan attack, the star of the Blues can not create a technical connection with the Messi-Suarez. Griezmann's statistics are so far insufficient: 4 goals in 13 games. Finally, he is not yet an incontrovertible holder since he has sometimes been on the bench of substitutes.
The lack of professionalism of Ousmane Demb√©l√©




Ousmane Dembele + 6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Ousmane Demb√©l√© is certainly a talented player but his professionalism still leaves something to be desired. Often late for collective training, the French striker is not unanimous in the locker room. His performance on the field (when he is not injured) is irregular. His lack of defensive rigor does not plead for him. And Ernesto Valverde does not seem inclined to give him presents. If the negative trend persists, it is possible that the winger will leave Catalonia next season.
The Masia is running out of steam




Ansu Fati, a promising youngster from Masia + 6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

For years, Masia, FC Barcelona's training center, has been the pride of Blaugrana leaders. But today, the Masia does not come out really gems, like the Messi, Xavi and Iniesta. On the European scene in particular, it does not help him. On the other hand, some young players, who feel they have the level to join the A team, show their incomprehension about Valverde's refusal to play them. Riqui Puig, for example, has highlighted his weariness in the face of his lack of playing time.
Arturo Vidal is unhappy




Arturo Vidal + 6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Chilean Arturo Vidal is very unhappy with his situation at FC Barcelona. The brave midfielder, faced with stiff competition, does not understand why he does not hold. Far from being resigned, Vidal, aged 32, may be suffering from his profile, too far from Bar√ßa's standards. However, his entries are often good for the device set up by Valverde.
Barca cash too many goals




Marc-Andr√© ter Stegen + 6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Despite the outstanding performance of German goalkeeper Marc-Andr√© ter Stegen, FC Barcelona have had too many goals for many months. The defensive block is not effective, as well as the laundry traditionally exercised by the Blaugrana. We have the feeling, moreover, that something broke in the defeat against Rome in the quarter-final return of the Champions League (3-0 defeat at Stadio Olimpico). This team suffered another comeback at Anfield last year (4-0 against Liverpool). Bar√ßa is therefore losing speed, if not confidence.
